original_text: And King Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba all that she desired, whatever she asked besides what was given her by the bounty of King Solomon. So she turned and went back to her own land with her servants.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 왕의 규례대로 스바의 여왕에게 물건을 준 것 외에 또 그의 소원대로 구하는 것을 주니 이에 그가 그의 신하들과 함께 본국으로 돌아갔더라

sentences.original_text: And King Solomon gave to the queen of Sheba
besides what was given her by the bounty of King Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕이 후하게 준 것 외에도

sentences.original_text: and went back to her own land
